long_description: patanjali paridhan is a promise â€“ a promise to celebrate our unique cultural identities through true indian fashion. it aims at encouraging all indians to embrace everything that is truly swadeshi, by combining our rich, textile heritage and centuries-old master craftsmanship, with innovative, modern, scientific approaches, at extremely affordable prices. using techniques, fabrics and technology that is made in india, for india, and by india, patanjali paridhan intends to elevate swadeshi fashion where it truly belongs - in the hearts of all indians. deals you can't miss.

generated_description: patanjali paridhan, legally known as patanjali paridhan pvt ltd., is a fashion company based in ranchi, jharkhand. the company specializes in a wide range of clothing and accessories for men, women, and children, including men's and women's wear, kids' wear, and home furnishings. patanjali paridhan emphasizes the use of indian-made techniques, fabrics, and technology to create affordable, high-quality fashion products. the company aims to celebrate indian cultural identities through its offerings, combining traditional craftsmanship with modern, scientific approaches.
